headline: What Starbucks (SBUX)'s 2026 Investor Day Overhaul Means For Shareholders
summary: Starbucks is preparing to unveil its long-term growth strategy at its 2026 Investor Day, as new CEO Brian Niccol rolls out initiatives such as coffeehouse coaches and a renewed focus on store-level experience to address slowing traffic and competitive pressures. While the company faces headwinds in China and fresh competition from fast-growing chains like Dutch Bros, investors and analysts are increasingly focused on how leadership-driven changes could reshape Starbucks’ global coffeehouse...
